result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for implementing a client to interact with the OpenAI API and defining data structures for API requests and responses.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating the client implementation and data models related to the OpenAI API.

internal/infras/openai/client.go.purpose: This file implements a client for interacting with the OpenAI API for chat completions.

internal/infras/openai/models.go.purpose: Defines data structures for handling OpenAI API requests and responses.
